title: The free sale component shall preferably be constructed in a separate block
clause_text: The free sale component shall preferably be constructed in a separate block. Sub-division of plots shall be permissible on the basis of equitable distribution of FSI, in case construction of free sale component is permitted by Commissioner.
section: 33(3) Buildings of Government/MCGM/Statutory Bodies, Semi- Government and PSU Offices:

source_pdf.text_snippet: The free sale component shall preferably be constructed in a separate block. Sub-division of plots shall be permissible on the basis of equitable distribution of FSI, in case construction of free sale
